Donald Rumsfeld alleges that he later learned a CIA agent on the ground had requested just that, but adds: I never received such a request from either Tommy Franks or Tenet. And can not imagine denying it if I had. If someone thought Osama bin Laden was cornered, as later claimed, I found it surprising that Tenet had never called me to urge Tommy Franks to support their operation. Donald Rumsfeld 's explanation? "Their recollections may be imperfect."
